metadata.title: CVE-2019-20797 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in e6y prboom-plus 2.5.1.5. There is a buffer overflow in client and server code responsible for handling received UDP packets, as demonstrated by I_SendPacket or I_SendPacketTo in i_network.c.

criterions.comment: prboom-plus package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:2.5.1.7um+git82-1').
